snippet.title: The Light Brigade - Launch Trailer (PSVR2, Quest2, Steam)
snippet.description:
The Light Brigade is a roguelike VR shooter with realistic gunplay and immersive light magic. Ascend the ranks of The Light Brigade to unlock new weapons, upgrades, classes, and abilities as you fight to restore light to the darkness.

Available NOW for $24.99!

🙏Play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579880/The_Light_Brigade/
🙏Play on Meta Quest 2: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2681027292004911/
🙏Play on PS5/PSVR2: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0275-PPSA07957_00-4474344745458047

Questions? Hit us up on Discord:
💬 https://discord.gg/funktroniclabs

Follow Us:
➡️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/funktroniclabs
➡️ Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@funktroniclabs

Press Inquiries: press@funktroniclabs.com
